events.message: We have successfully received the application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for further evaluation by the technical team.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the application process and coordinate the next steps with the candidate and hiring managers.
The initial screening interview has been successfully conducted, addressing the candidate's experience and suitability for the engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly with additional details about their software development background and expressed strong interest in proceeding.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software architecture and coding practices.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and to assess the candidate's alignment with our values.
The candidate completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and contributing to future projects.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary details, benefits, and starting date information.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the onboarding and team structure.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to start their new role within the engineering department.
The candidate has commenced onboarding activities including orientation sessions, access to engineering environments, and team introductions.
The recruitment process is now complete with the candidate successfully onboarded and fully integrated into the engineering team.
